mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qg_goods_temp_stock_temp ( goodsId, userId, STATUS, createdTime, updatedTime, xid ) VALUES ( #{gts.goodsId}, #{gts.userId}, #{gts.status}, #{gts.createdTime}, #{gts.updatedTime}, #{xid} );
INSERT INTO qg_goods_temp_stock ( id, goodsId, userId, STATUS, createdTime, updatedTime ) SELECT id,goodsId,userId,STATUS, createdTime, updatedTime From qg_goods_temp_stock_temp WHERE xid =#{xid}
